scripts.say: It looks like we've finally finished the first chapter of our journey. I'll be counting on you a lot more moving forward. All right, Commander?
Did you think it was already over? We are still just beginning our new journey~
Hee hee. Does hearing that make you disappointed? Or maybe, excited?
By the way, I'm a bit excited too. So, let's write the next chapter of our story together~â™ª
